title: How farmer's in India's Sundarbans area are using climate smart agriculture

tasks.task: Locate and arrive at Bongeri village in South 24 Parganas for agricultural development.
subtasks: Navigate through difficult conditions (waterlogged area after cyclone).

tasks.task: Participate in the National Initiative on Climate Resilient Agriculture pilot project.
subtasks: Understand soil testing and reduce chemical inputs.
Witness successful agricultural development despite past cyclone damage.
